title: São Tomé and Príncipe - African Development Bank Group Approves Additional $8.9 Million Gef Grant to Strengthen Agricultural and Fisheries Sectors Against Climate Shocks
description:
The African Development Bank Group's Board of Directors has approved an additional grant of $8.9 million from the Global Environment Facility (GEF) to support São Tomé and Príncipe's efforts to build resilience against climate change and boost agricultural productivity.

This supplementary funding b...

title: São Tomé and Príncipe - African Development Bank and Government Step Up Delivery of €72 Million Country Portfolio to Drive Economic Diversification
description:
The African Development Bank Group and the government of São Tomé and Principe have redoubled efforts to strengthen the Bank's €72 million portfolio in the country and drive the country's economic diversification.

"The African Development Bank's lending portfolio in São Tomé and Principe represents...

title: Preview: Sao Tome & Principe vs Tunisia
description:
By Ademola Adediji | 08 Oct 2025 16:31 , Last updated: 09 Oct 2025 08:46

A dead-rubber fixture in Group H of CAF 2026 World Cup Qualifying will see Sao Tome & Príncipe go head-to-head with Tunisia, who have already booked their place at the Mundial on Friday at Stade Olympique de Rades.

title: Sao Tome and Principe hails partnership with China as model of South-South cooperation
description:
SAO TOME, Oct. 1 (Xinhua) -- Sao Tome and Principe has called for its growing ties with China to serve as an inspiring example of South-South cooperation, highlighting the historic depth and modern vitality of bilateral relations.

title: São Tomé and Príncipe: World Bank Boosts Social Protection and Resilience for 27,500 People
description: WASHINGTON, October 14, 2025 – The World Bank and the Government of São Tomé and Príncipe signed an agreement for $6 million in additional financing to support the Social Protection, Resilience, and Recovery Project.
